DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety intra-articular LBSA0103 versus intra-articular hyaluronic acid injection ( Hyruan Plus Injection ) weekly 3 week treatment patient osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety LBSA0103 Versus Hyruan Plus Injection Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Over 40 year age Kellgren & Lawrence grade IIII If one knee weight bear pain least 40mm evaluate 100mm VAS Be willing discontinue nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , analgesic , condroichin sulfate/glucosamine physical therapy duration study Body mass index > 32 Have rheumarthritis Patients weightbearing pain le 40mm knee measure 100mmVAS Have Sudek 's atrophy , Paget 's disease , Spinal disc herniation Kellgren & Lawrence Grade IV
